text.name: Though it must be prefaced that E.G.O gears are standardized equipment,
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] with its effects

text.name: Though it must be prefaced that E.G.O gears are standardized equipment,
text.desc:
[StartBattle] On Clash Lose, gain Final Power equal to the number of Skills targeting this unit (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] with its effects
[DefeatDuel] [Burst] Potency inflicted by this Skill +1

text.name: Though it must be prefaced that E.G.O gears are standardized equipment,
text.desc:
[StartBattle] On Clash Lose, gain Final Power equal to the number of Skills targeting this unit (max 3)
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] with its effects
[DefeatDuel] [Burst] Potency inflicted by this Skill +2

text.name: when juxtaposed with E.G.O gear from L Corp., depending on the degree of attunement to the Abnormality,
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its effects

text.name: when juxtaposed with E.G.O gear from L Corp., depending on the degree of attunement to the Abnormality,

[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its effects

text.name: when juxtaposed with E.G.O gear from L Corp., depending on the degree of attunement to the Abnormality,
text.desc:
[StartBattle] <style="highlight">On Clash Lose, gain (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) Final Power (max 6)
[WhenUse] Gain +4 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its effects
[DefeatDuel] [Burst] Count inflicted by this Skill +2

text.name: the idiosyncrasies of the source may be utilized with greater flexibility
text.desc:
Deal +0.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self
[StartBattle] Base Power +1 for every Skill that targets this unit (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [GlowingLantern] (once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain +6 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Potency or Count with its effects; instead, gain Base Power +1
[EndSkill] Heal 30 SP

text.name: the idiosyncrasies of the source may be utilized with greater flexibility
text.desc:
Deal +0.8% damage for every 1% missing HP on self
[StartBattle] Base Power +1 for every Skill that targets this unit (max 3)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [GlowingLantern] (once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain +8 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Potency or Count with its effects; instead, gain Base Power +1
[EndSkill] Heal 30 SP

text.name: Yet, the degree to which that attunement and synchronization are achieved may resultantly allow the user to be devoured
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain 2 [GlowingLantern] (once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain +6 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its effects; instead, gain Base Power +3

text.name: Yet, the degree to which that attunement and synchronization are achieved may resultantly allow the user to be devoured

[WhenUse] Gain +8 [Aggro] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] Count with its effects; instead, gain Base Power +3

1011121.name: E.G.O disintegration is not unlike decomposition of compost
1011121.desc: When 1 ally with the least HP is killed, gain 2 E.G.O resources for 2 E.G.O least-owned E.G.O resources

1011101.name: This is reflected in their appearance, more closely resembling the source Abnormality than E.G.O of the former L Corp. do
1011101.desc:
On death, inflict 4 [Burst] and +2 [Burst] Count against the target that attacked this unit last; then, gain 2 E.G.O resources for 4 least-owned E.G.O resources.
- If no one attacked this unit, or if an ally killed this unit, inflict 4 [Burst] and +2 [Burst] Count against the enemy with the least [Burst] Count

1011111.name: This is reflected in their appearance, more closely resembling the source Abnormality than E.G.O of the former L Corp. do
1011111.desc:
On death, inflict <style="highlight">5</style> [Burst] and +<style="highlight">3</style> [Burst] Count against the target that attacked this unit last; then, gain 2 E.G.O resources for 4 least-owned E.G.O resources.
- If no one attacked this unit, or if an ally killed this unit, inflict 5 [Burst] and +3 [Burst] Count against the enemy with the least [Burst] Count
- If this unit is in a [GlowingLantern] state, inflict double the [Burst] potency with this effect
